meanings.sent1: The goops on the tree trunk made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally stepped in a puddle of goops on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The goops from the spilled juice made the floor slippery.
meanings.sent4: The goops of glue held the pieces of the broken vase together.
meanings.sent5: The goops of mud on his shoes left a trail behind him.

meanings.sent1: Don't be a goops and forget your lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: He always acts like a goops in front of his friends.
meanings.sent3: The class clown was known for his goops-like behavior.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a goops when she realized she had forgotten her keys.
meanings.sent5: The movie character was portrayed as a lovable goops.
